topic.title: We will not have a reputation system in ZeroNET
topic.body: to all the homo's. please exit ZeroNET we don't need you gays in this system

1_1HrRNH7KbdxMjwLmwrHmZqJrzVZVDKc9bF.body: this idiot wants censorship,   graveyardswatch get out of zeronet, if you want all those already established things. you idiot are in the wrong part of the Internet. I speak for everybody from ZeroNet developers and users. fuck off.

4_1BFTNXtYQDMCurqyg45KLmsV6oJD7bQSsH.body: silverstorm, you got shit for brains, you don't understand how decentralized networks work. get out of here. we don't need homos from the outside to ruin our network
to all the homos, that want reputation system, please open you butt hole and slid in your finger inside while you exit ZeroNET.  the developers already said NO to reputation systems.

1_1DjUq8hd2jYZgc5uNhQEtWUVZjMHkMQkpU.body: need a torrent based database everybody can use and clone
